00036 class GridClusteringStrategy implements ClusteringStrategy {
00037 
00038         private static final boolean DEBUG_GRID = false;
00039         private DebugHelper debugHelper;
00040 
00041         private final MarkerOptions markerOptions = new MarkerOptions();
00042 
00043         private boolean addMarkersDynamically;
00044         private double baseClusterSize;
00045         private IGoogleMap map;
00046         private Map<DelegatingMarker, ClusterMarker> markers;
00047         private double clusterSize;
00048         private int oldZoom, zoom;
00049         private int[] visibleClusters = new int[4];
00050 
00051         private Map<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker> clusters = new HashMap<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker>();
00052 
00053         private ClusterRefresher refresher;
00054         private ClusterOptionsProvider clusterOptionsProvider;
00055         private IconDataProvider iconDataProvider;
00056 
00057         public GridClusteringStrategy(ClusteringSettings settings, IGoogleMap map, List<DelegatingMarker> markers, ClusterRefresher refresher) {
00058                 this.clusterOptionsProvider = settings.getClusterOptionsProvider();
00059                 this.iconDataProvider = settings.getIconDataProvider();
00060                 this.addMarkersDynamically = settings.isAddMarkersDynamically();
00061                 this.baseClusterSize = settings.getClusterSize();
00062                 this.map = map;
00063                 this.markers = new HashMap<DelegatingMarker, ClusterMarker>();
00064                 this.refresher = refresher;
00065                 this.zoom = Math.round(map.getCameraPosition().zoom);
00066                 this.clusterSize = calculateClusterSize(zoom);
00067                 addVisibleMarkers(markers);
00068         }
00069 
00070         @Override
00071         public void cleanup() {
00072                 for (ClusterMarker cluster : clusters.values()) {
00073                         cluster.cleanup();
00074                 }
00075                 clusters.clear();
00076                 markers.clear();
00077                 refresher.cleanup();
00078                 if (DEBUG_GRID) {
00079                         if (debugHelper != null) {
00080                                 debugHelper.cleanup();
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 
00085         @Override
00086         public void onCameraChange(CameraPosition cameraPosition) {
00087                 oldZoom = zoom;
00088                 zoom = Math.round(cameraPosition.zoom);
00089                 double clusterSize = calculateClusterSize(zoom);
00090                 if (this.clusterSize != clusterSize) {
00091                         this.clusterSize = clusterSize;
00092                         recalculate();
00093                 } else if (addMarkersDynamically) {
00094                         addMarkersInVisibleRegion();
00095                 }
00096                 if (DEBUG_GRID) {
00097                         if (debugHelper == null) {
00098                                 debugHelper = new DebugHelper();
00099                         }
00100                         debugHelper.drawDebugGrid(map, clusterSize);
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 
00104         @Override
00105         public void onClusterGroupChange(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00106                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00107                         return;
00108                 }
00109                 ClusterMarker oldCluster = markers.get(marker);
00110                 if (oldCluster != null) {
00111                         oldCluster.remove(marker);
00112                         refresh(oldCluster);
00113                 }
00114                 addMarker(marker);
00115         }
00116 
00117         @Override
00118         public void onAdd(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00119                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00120                         return;
00121                 }
00122                 addMarker(marker);
00123         }
00124 
00125         private void addMarker(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00126                 int clusterGroup = marker.getClusterGroup();
00127                 if (clusterGroup < 0) {
00128                         markers.put(marker, null);
00129                         marker.changeVisible(true);
00130                 } else {
00131                         LatLng position = marker.getPosition();
00132                         ClusterKey key = calculateClusterKey(clusterGroup, position);
00133                         ClusterMarker cluster = findClusterById(key);
00134                         cluster.add(marker);
00135                         markers.put(marker, cluster);
00136                         if (!addMarkersDynamically || isPositionInVisibleClusters(position)) {
00137                                 refresh(cluster);
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 
00142         private boolean isPositionInVisibleClusters(LatLng position) {
00143                 int y = convLat(position.latitude);
00144                 int x = convLng(position.longitude);
00145                 int[] b = visibleClusters;
00146                 return b[0] <= y && y <= b[2] && (b[1] <= x && x <= b[3] || b[1] > b[3] && (b[1] <= x || x <= b[3]));
00147         }
00148 
00149         @Override
00150         public void onRemove(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00151                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00152                         return;
00153                 }
00154                 removeMarker(marker);
00155         }
00156 
00157         private void removeMarker(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00158                 ClusterMarker cluster = markers.remove(marker);
00159                 if (cluster != null) {
00160                         cluster.remove(marker);
00161                         refresh(cluster);
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         @Override
00166         public void onPositionChange(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00167                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00168                         return;
00169                 }
00170                 ClusterMarker oldCluster = markers.get(marker);
00171                 if (oldCluster != null) {
00172                         oldCluster.remove(marker);
00173                         refresh(oldCluster);
00174                 }
00175                 addMarker(marker);
00176         }
00177 
00178         @Override
00179         public Marker map(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker original) {
00180                 for (ClusterMarker cluster : clusters.values()) {
00181                         if (original.equals(cluster.getVirtual())) {
00182                                 return cluster;
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185                 return null;
00186         }
00187 
00188         @Override
00189         public List<Marker> getDisplayedMarkers() {
00190                 List<Marker> displayedMarkers = new ArrayList<Marker>();
00191                 for (ClusterMarker cluster : clusters.values()) {
00192                         Marker displayedMarker = cluster.getDisplayedMarker();
00193                         if (displayedMarker != null) {
00194                                 displayedMarkers.add(displayedMarker);
00195                         }
00196                 }
00197                 for (DelegatingMarker marker : markers.keySet()) {
00198                         if (markers.get(marker) == null) {
00199                                 displayedMarkers.add(marker);
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202                 return displayedMarkers;
00203         }
00204 
00205         @Override
00206         public float getMinZoomLevelNotClustered(Marker marker) {
00207                 if (!markers.containsKey(marker)) {
00208                         throw new UnsupportedOperationException("marker is not visible or is a cluster");
00209                 }
00210                 int zoom = 0;
00211                 while (zoom <= 25 && hasCollision(marker, zoom)) {
00212                         zoom++;
00213                 }
00214                 if (zoom > 25) {
00215                         return Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
00216                 }
00217                 return zoom;
00218         }
00219 
00220         private boolean hasCollision(Marker marker, int zoom) {
00221                 double clusterSize = calculateClusterSize(zoom);
00222                 LatLng position = marker.getPosition();
00223                 int x = (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLongitude(position.longitude) / clusterSize);
00224                 int y = (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLatitude(position.latitude) / clusterSize);
00225                 for (DelegatingMarker m : markers.keySet()) {
00226                         if (m.equals(marker)) {
00227                                 continue;
00228                         }
00229                         LatLng mPosition = m.getPosition();
00230                         int mX = (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLongitude(mPosition.longitude) / clusterSize);
00231                         if (x != mX) {
00232                                 continue;
00233                         }
00234                         int mY = (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLatitude(mPosition.latitude) / clusterSize);
00235                         if (y == mY) {
00236                                 return true;
00237                         }
00238                 }
00239                 return false;
00240         }
00241 
00242         private ClusterMarker findClusterById(ClusterKey key) {
00243                 ClusterMarker cluster = clusters.get(key);
00244                 if (cluster == null) {
00245                         cluster = new ClusterMarker(this);
00246                         clusters.put(key, cluster);
00247                 }
00248                 return cluster;
00249         }
00250 
00251         @Override
00252         public void onVisibilityChangeRequest(DelegatingMarker marker, boolean visible) {
00253                 if (visible) {
00254                         addMarker(marker);
00255                 } else {
00256                         removeMarker(marker);
00257                         marker.changeVisible(false);
00258                 }
00259         }
00260 
00261         @Override
00262         public void onShowInfoWindow(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00263                 if (!marker.isVisible()) {
00264                         return;
00265                 }
00266                 ClusterMarker cluster = markers.get(marker);
00267                 if (cluster == null) {
00268                         marker.forceShowInfoWindow();
00269                 } else if (cluster.getMarkersInternal().size() == 1) {
00270                         cluster.refresh();
00271                         marker.forceShowInfoWindow();
00272                 }
00273         }
00274 
00275         private void refresh(ClusterMarker cluster) {
00276                 if (cluster != null) {
00277                         refresher.refresh(cluster);
00278                 }
00279         }
00280 
00281         private void addVisibleMarkers(List<DelegatingMarker> markers) {
00282                 if (addMarkersDynamically) {
00283                         calculateVisibleClusters();
00284                 }
00285                 for (DelegatingMarker marker : markers) {
00286                         if (marker.isVisible()) {
00287                                 addMarker(marker);
00288                         }
00289                 }
00290                 refresher.refreshAll();
00291         }
00292 
00293         private void recalculate() {
00294                 if (addMarkersDynamically) {
00295                         calculateVisibleClusters();
00296                 }
00297                 if (zoomedIn()) {
00298                         splitClusters();
00299                 } else {
00300                         joinClusters();
00301                 }
00302                 refresher.refreshAll();
00303         }
00304 
00305         private boolean zoomedIn() {
00306                 return zoom > oldZoom;
00307         }
00308 
00309         private void splitClusters() {
00310                 Map<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker> newClusters = new HashMap<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker>();
00311                 for (ClusterMarker cluster : clusters.values()) {
00312                         List<DelegatingMarker> ms = cluster.getMarkersInternal();
00313                         if (ms.isEmpty()) {
00314                                 cluster.removeVirtual();
00315                                 continue;
00316                         }
00317                         ClusterKey[] clusterIds = new ClusterKey[ms.size()];
00318                         boolean allSame = true;
00319                         for (int j = 0; j < ms.size(); j++) {
00320                                 clusterIds[j] = calculateClusterKey(ms.get(j).getClusterGroup(), ms.get(j).getPosition());
00321                                 if (!clusterIds[j].equals(clusterIds[0])) {
00322                                         allSame = false;
00323                                 }
00324                         }
00325                         if (allSame) {
00326                                 newClusters.put(clusterIds[0], cluster);
00327                                 if (addMarkersDynamically && isPositionInVisibleClusters(cluster.getMarkersInternal().get(0).getPosition())) {
00328                                         refresh(cluster);
00329                                 }
00330                         } else {
00331                                 cluster.removeVirtual();
00332                                 for (int j = 0; j < ms.size(); j++) {
00333                                         cluster = newClusters.get(clusterIds[j]);
00334                                         if (cluster == null) {
00335                                                 cluster = new ClusterMarker(this);
00336                                                 newClusters.put(clusterIds[j], cluster);
00337                                                 if (!addMarkersDynamically || isPositionInVisibleClusters(ms.get(j).getPosition())) {
00338                                                         refresh(cluster);
00339                                                 }
00340                                         }
00341                                         cluster.add(ms.get(j));
00342                                         markers.put(ms.get(j), cluster);
00343                                 }
00344                         }
00345                 }
00346                 clusters = newClusters;
00347         }
00348 
00349         private void joinClusters() {
00350                 Map<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker> newClusters = new HashMap<ClusterKey, ClusterMarker>();
00351                 Map<ClusterKey, List<ClusterMarker>> oldClusters = new HashMap<ClusterKey, List<ClusterMarker>>();
00352                 for (ClusterMarker cluster : clusters.values()) {
00353                         List<DelegatingMarker> ms = cluster.getMarkersInternal();
00354                         if (ms.isEmpty()) {
00355                                 cluster.removeVirtual();
00356                                 continue;
00357                         }
00358                         ClusterKey clusterId = calculateClusterKey(ms.get(0).getClusterGroup(), ms.get(0).getPosition());
00359                         List<ClusterMarker> clusterList = oldClusters.get(clusterId);
00360                         if (clusterList == null) {
00361                                 clusterList = new ArrayList<ClusterMarker>();
00362                                 oldClusters.put(clusterId, clusterList);
00363                         }
00364                         clusterList.add(cluster);
00365                 }
00366                 for (ClusterKey key : oldClusters.keySet()) {
00367                         List<ClusterMarker> clusterList = oldClusters.get(key);
00368                         if (clusterList.size() == 1) {
00369                                 ClusterMarker cluster = clusterList.get(0);
00370                                 newClusters.put(key, cluster);
00371                                 if (addMarkersDynamically && isPositionInVisibleClusters(cluster.getMarkersInternal().get(0).getPosition())) {
00372                                         refresh(cluster);
00373                                 }
00374                         } else {
00375                                 ClusterMarker cluster = new ClusterMarker(this);
00376                                 newClusters.put(key, cluster);
00377                                 if (!addMarkersDynamically || isPositionInVisibleClusters(clusterList.get(0).getMarkersInternal().get(0).getPosition())) {
00378                                         refresh(cluster);
00379                                 }
00380                                 for (ClusterMarker old : clusterList) {
00381                                         old.removeVirtual();
00382                                         List<DelegatingMarker> ms = old.getMarkersInternal();
00383                                         for (DelegatingMarker m : ms) {
00384                                                 cluster.add(m);
00385                                                 markers.put(m, cluster);
00386                                         }
00387                                 }
00388                         }
00389                 }
00390                 clusters = newClusters;
00391         }
00392 
00393         private void addMarkersInVisibleRegion() {
00394                 calculateVisibleClusters();
00395                 for (DelegatingMarker marker : markers.keySet()) {
00396                         LatLng position = marker.getPosition();
00397                         if (isPositionInVisibleClusters(position)) {
00398                                 ClusterMarker cluster = markers.get(marker);
00399                                 refresh(cluster);
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 refresher.refreshAll();
00403         }
00404 
00405         private void calculateVisibleClusters() {
00406                 IProjection projection = map.getProjection();
00407                 VisibleRegion visibleRegion = projection.getVisibleRegion();
00408                 LatLngBounds bounds = visibleRegion.latLngBounds;
00409                 visibleClusters[0] = convLat(bounds.southwest.latitude);
00410                 visibleClusters[1] = convLng(bounds.southwest.longitude);
00411                 visibleClusters[2] = convLat(bounds.northeast.latitude);
00412                 visibleClusters[3] = convLng(bounds.northeast.longitude);
00413         }
00414 
00415         private ClusterKey calculateClusterKey(int group, LatLng position) {
00416                 int y = convLat(position.latitude);
00417                 int x = convLng(position.longitude);
00418                 return new ClusterKey(group, y, x);
00419         }
00420 
00421         private int convLat(double lat) {
00422                 return (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLatitude(lat) / clusterSize);
00423         }
00424 
00425         private int convLng(double lng) {
00426                 return (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLongitude(lng) / clusterSize);
00427         }
00428 
00429         private double calculateClusterSize(int zoom) {
00430                 return baseClusterSize / (1 << zoom);
00431         }
00432 
00433         com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker createMarker(List<Marker> markers, LatLng position) {
00434                 if (clusterOptionsProvider != null) {
00435                         ClusterOptions opts = clusterOptionsProvider.getClusterOptions(markers);
00436                         return map.addMarker(markerOptions.position(position).icon(opts.getIcon()).anchor(opts.getAnchorU(), opts.getAnchorV()));
00437                 }
00438                 if (iconDataProvider != null) {
00439                         MarkerOptions opts = iconDataProvider.getIconData(markers.size());
00440                         return map.addMarker(markerOptions.position(position).icon(opts.getIcon()).anchor(opts.getAnchorU(), opts.getAnchorV()));
00441                 }
00442                 throw new RuntimeException();
00443         }
00444 
00445         private static class ClusterKey {
00446                 private final int group;
00447                 private final int latitudeId;
00448                 private final int longitudeId;
00449 
00450                 public ClusterKey(int group, int latitudeId, int longitudeId) {
00451                         this.group = group;
00452                         this.latitudeId = latitudeId;
00453                         this.longitudeId = longitudeId;
00454                 }
00455 
00456                 @Override
00457                 public boolean equals(Object o) {
00458                         if (this == o) {
00459                                 return true;
00460                         }
00461                         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
00462                                 return false;
00463                         }
00464 
00465                         ClusterKey that = (ClusterKey) o;
00466 
00467                         if (group != that.group) {
00468                                 return false;
00469                         }
00470                         if (latitudeId != that.latitudeId) {
00471                                 return false;
00472                         }
00473                         if (longitudeId != that.longitudeId) {
00474                                 return false;
00475                         }
00476                         return true;
00477                 }
00478 
00479                 @Override
00480                 public int hashCode() {
00481                         int result = group;
00482                         result = 31 * result + latitudeId;
00483                         result = 31 * result + longitudeId;
00484                         return result;
00485                 }
00486         }
